文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk1
证据片段: Under severe fuel-damage (SFD) conditions a combined external and internal oxidation of the fuel-rod cladding occurs due to a reaction with steam or oxygen on the outside surface and the UO2 fuel on the inside surface.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk1
证据片段: The reaction kinetics have been studied with isothermal and transient temperature experiments above 500°C

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk1
证据片段: The tests were performed using short LWR fuel-rod sections in an (Ar + 25 vol% O2) environment.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk1
证据片段: The present work describes the results of out-of-pile annealing experiments with LWR fuel-rod sections conducted from 900 to 2000°C in an oxidizing atmosphere under isothermal and transient temperature conditions.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk1
证据片段: The present work describes the results of out-of-pile annealing experiments with LWR fuel-rod sections conducted from 900 to 2000°C in an oxidizing atmosphere under isothermal and transient temperature conditions.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk1
证据片段: The out-of-pile UO2/Zry reaction experiments were performed in an (Ar + 25 vol% O2) gas mixture

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk1
证据片段: The tests were made using short cladding tube specimens filled with stoichiometric high-density UO2 pellets.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk1
证据片段: The maximum cladding temperature was 2000°C, and the annealing times varied between 1 and 150 min.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk1
证据片段: The external overpressure was about 40 bar in most of the experiments.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk2
证据片段: the tubing has to be considered as a finite system. For this reason, the external and internal oxygen uptake influence each other and an accelerated reaction-layer growth is observed at longer reaction times

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk2
证据片段: After the disappearance of the β-phase, the oxidized cladding tube is completely embrittled, and no longer mechanically stable

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk2
证据片段: The time to embrittlement is only about 3 min for double-sided oxidation of the cladding at 1400°C

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk3
证据片段: the cladding will be completely oxidized, depending on the heat-up and cool-down rate, between 1800 and 2000°C

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk3
证据片段: No oxide spalling could be noticed.

证据片段: Calculations with the PECLOX model were also performed for temperature transient experiments at a heat-up and cool-down rate of $1 ~ \mathrm { K } / \mathsf s$

证据片段: Further model improvements are planned with respect to steam-starvation and hydrogen-blanketing conditions on the external cladding tube surface.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk8
证据片段: The external steam/Zircaloy or oxygen/Zircaloy and internal UO2/Zircaloy chemical interactions in LWR fuel rods under SFD conditions result in the formation of following reaction layers at all temperatures examined

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk8
证据片段: TEMPERATURE (C): 1500.0 TIME (SECONDS) : 510.0

证据片段: Oxygen-concentration distribution in the various interaction layers during a temperature transient after 1010 s (1000°C)

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk8
证据片段: The growth of the reaction layer initially obeys a parabolic rate law and the diffusion of oxygen into the cladding is the rate-determining step.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk8
证据片段: The UO2/Zircaloy reaction occurs as rapidly as the steam/Zircaloy and (Ar+25vol% O2)/Zircaloy reaction.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk8
证据片段: The (Ar+25vol% O2) gas mixture can be used to simulate the steam environment.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk8
证据片段: Due to the combined external and internal cladding oxidation, the embrittlement of Zircaloy tubing occurs about four times faster than oxidation from either surface alone.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk8
证据片段: Since the oxygen potential (partial pressure) of the steam or the (Ar+25vol% O2) gas mixture is higher than that of the UO2 the final stable reaction product is ZrO2.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk8
证据片段: The initially metallic Γ(U,Zr) alloy is converted into a (U,Zr)O2 mixed-oxide phase.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk9
证据片段: In our case isothermal oxidation experiments above 1400°C could not be performed. During the intended heatup to 1500°C an uncontrolled temperature escalation of the specimen occurred at about 1470°C due to the exothermic Zry/oxygen interaction.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk9
证据片段: However, in a quasi-adiabatic system, such as a reactor core, temperature escalation may start sooner, between 1000 and 1100°C, as observed in tube furnace oxidation experiments.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk9
证据片段: The influence of the initial material condition on the deformation behavior of Zircaloy cladding tubes at 600 and 800°C is systematically investigated by closed end creep rupture tests and transient burst tests in air.
测试类型: creep rupture test, transient burst test

证据片段: The influence of the initial material condition on the deformation behavior of Zircaloy cladding tubes at 600 and 800°C is systematically investigated by closed end creep rupture tests and transient burst tests in air.

文献ID: STP939-EB-Zirconium in the Nuclear Industry_7th Volume_040_chunk9
证据片段: At 800°C the strain rate of the cladding tube diameter can be described by the Norton creep equation
